title: 第18屆蕭邦國際鋼琴大賽集中討論區

replies.msg:
Warsaw: piano capital of the world – the 18th Chopin Piano Competition

October 2nd to 23rd 2021 Warsaw

The new dates of the Preliminary Round

Ladies and Gentlemen,

we enter 2021 filled with hope that the COVID-19 pandemic will be contained soon. 2020 taught us to think humbly about our plans. It also showed us how much effort and patience would be needed to experience the beauty of music responsibly. It also has shown how important – indispensable – part of our humanity is live music.

The hopes that accompany us in January 2021 make us believe that live music will come back, unrestricted by the sanitary regime, that the concert halls will be full again and the brilliant interpretations of music will allow us to experience beauty together.

We believe that the awaited 18th International Fryderyk Chopin Piano Competition will take place in in October 2021.

Taking care of our common safety as well as the comfort of the participants, jurors and the audience, we have decided to change the dates of the Preliminary Round of the Competition. The current dates are 12-23 July 2021. The Preliminary Round will be carried out in accordance with the previous plans at the Chamber Hall of the National Philharmonic.

I hope that you would understand this change of the dates and accept it. I also hope we would meet soon at the concerts.

Kind regards,

dr. Artur Szklener

Director of The Fryderyk Chopin Institute

The dates of the Preliminary Round of the 18th Chopin Competition have been changed. Over 160 pianists qualified for the Competition will be performing in Warsaw on 12-23 July 2021 at the Chamber Hall of the National Philharmonic.

The consultations with the jurors of the Competition preceded the decision concerning the change of the date of the preliminary round. The decision is related to the current COVID-19 pandemic.

The list of the pianists that are qualified for the preliminary round has not changed and you can see it here.

All tickets purchased so far for the earlier dates of the preliminary round of the Chopin Competition remain valid.

The tickets purchased for the first dates of the Preliminary Round (i.e. April 2020) remain valid for the following dates:

The returns of the ticket made after the provided date are subject to the Rules and Regulations.

The procedure of the ticket return is available here.

18TH CHOPIN COMPETITION

The 18th Chopin Competition will take place on 2-23 October 2021 at the National Philharmonic in Warsaw.

The rules and regulation of the Competition as well as all up-to-date information about the upcoming edition are available on the official website of the Competition: www.chopin2020.pl as well as in the mobile app for iOS and Android: ‘Chopin Competition’.

Contact for media:

Aleksander Laskowski

Spokesman

The Fryderyk Chopin Institute
